Source code for toto.filters.spike_removal

""" Remove spikes
    Spikes can be found using find_peaks:
    see https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/generated/scipy.signal.find_peaks.html
"""

import numpy as np
from scipy.signal import find_peaks


[docs]def spike_removal(input_array,args={'height':float(),
                                    'threshold':float(),
                                    'distance':float(),
                                    'prominence':float(),
                                    'width':float(),
                                    'wlen':float(),
                                    'rel_height':float(),
                                    'plateau_size':int()
                                    }):

    if 'LonLat' in args:
        args.pop('LonLat')

    y=input_array.to_numpy(copy=True)
    keys=list(args.keys())
    for key in keys:
        if args[key]==0:
            args.pop(key)


    ind = find_peaks(y,**args)[0]
    
    y[ind]=np.nan
    input_array.values[:]=y

   
    return input_array
